mapper.insert: insert into date_apply (id, userid1, userid2, applyinfo, replyinfo, result, applydate) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applyinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{replyinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applydate,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update date_apply set userid1 = #{userid1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userid2 = #{userid2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, applyinfo = #{applyinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, replyinfo = #{replyinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, applydate = #{applydate,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, userid1, userid2, applyinfo, replyinfo, result, applydate from date_apply
